EmailTemplate.name: Calvin Klein Ecomm Auto-Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Calvin Klein Customer Service Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Calvin Klein Customer Service.
This is an automated response to let you know that we have received your request ({!Case.CaseNumber}).
Please be patient as all cases are handled in the order in which they are received. We appreciate your understanding during this time and look forward to assisting you.
Please Note: If you need to cancel or edit your order, we offer a 30-minute grace period upon order confirmation. You can cancel your order on your order confirmation email or on your account page. Please note your order will be processed after 30 minutes. All attempts to cancel or edit an order after this period will not be validated.
{!Case.ReferenceID__c}
